Features:

1. Generates random login credentials for user registration and password reset (using CSRF tokens)
2. Allows user to login with any valid credentials they have entered
3. Disables CSRF tokens for later use in other scripts or functions
4. Allows user to logout using form posted via CSRF token (to clear tokens)
